data.route_analysis: Copenhagen can be easily accessed by train or plane, with major connections from across Europe. Public transport options are robust, including buses and metro systems.
data.pricing_trends: Travel packages to Denmark surge in price during July due to high demand. Booking in advance can yield better prices. Typical costs for accommodation may rise by 20-30% this month.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak tourist season runs from June to August, with July being the busiest month. Travelers can expect long daylight hours and various outdoor festivals during this time.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking windows are around 3-6 months in advance for summer travel. Last-minute travelers may find significant price increases.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Copenhagen can be easily accessed by train or plane, with major connections from across Europe. Public transport options are robust, including buses and metro systems.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Peak tourist season runs from June to August, with July being the busiest month. Travelers can expect long daylight hours and various outdoor festivals during this time.
destination_insights.climate: Summer temperatures typically range from 15째C to 25째C (59째F to 77째F), with a chance of rain. Light clothing with a waterproof layer is recommended.
destination_insights.culture: Denmark's rich history is reflected in cultural festivals, landmarks like Tivoli Gardens, and culinary experiences focusing on fresh, local ingredients.
destination_insights.attractions: Top attractions include the Little Mermaid statue, Nyhavn Harbor, and the historic Rosenborg Castle.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Travel packages to Denmark surge in price during July due to high demand. Booking in advance can yield better prices. Typical costs for accommodation may rise by 20-30% this month.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking windows are around 3-6 months in advance for summer travel. Last-minute travelers may find significant price increases.
market_insights.competition: Alternative destinations like Sweden and Norway offer similar attractions but may provide better pricing during peak seasons.
market_insights.demand: There is a strong interest in eco-tourism and local experiences, aligning with Denmark's focus on sustainability.

trend_insights.market_trends: Sustainable tourism is gaining traction, with many travelers opting for eco-friendly accommodations and experiences.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly researching destinations online and seeking personalized travel packages that cater to unique interests.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Denmark is positioned as a premium destination for travelers seeking both relaxation and activity.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel patterns are heavily influenced by festival seasons in Denmark; summer festivals drive tourism to specific cities.
